chart_description: This chart displays the rate of waste events for the main cache of Netdata's DB engine. Waste events indicate when an in-memory object is evicted or flushed from the cache due to full memory usage.

dimension_descriptions.evict spins: The rate at which objects are evicted from the cache due to full memory usage.
dimension_descriptions.flush spins: The rate at which objects are flushed from the cache due to full memory usage.
